mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE,'YYYY')||'년 ' ||TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE, 'MON')||TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE,'DD')||'일' HIREDATE , W.OCCUPATION , W.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE , P.POSITION , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , T.DEPT_NAME FROM EMP E , WORK_INFO W , DEPT T , POSITION P WHERE E.EMP_CODE = W.EMP_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = T.DEPT_CODE AND E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE AND E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}

SELECT E.EMP_NAME , P.POSITION , D.DEPT_NAME , TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"' ) AS HIREDATE , REPLACE(MS.APPLY_YEAR_MONTH,'-','년')||'월' AS APPLY_YEAR_MONTH , (TO_CHAR(ms.TOTAL_EXT_SAL, '9,999,999,999')) ||'원' as TOTAL_EXT_SAL , (TO_CHAR(ms.TOTAL_DEDUCTION, '9,999,999,999')) ||'원' as TOTAL_DEDUCTION , (TO_CHAR(ms.TOTAL_PAYMENT, '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as TOTAL_PAYMENT , (TO_CHAR(ms.REAL_SALARY, '9,999,999,999')) ||'원' as REAL_SALARY , (TO_CHAR(ms.SALARY, '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as SALARY , (TO_CHAR(ms.COST, '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as COST , (TO_CHAR(MAX(decode(md.DEDUCTION_NAME,'건강보험',price,price,null)), '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as HEALTH_INS , (TO_CHAR(MAX(decode(md.DEDUCTION_NAME,'고용보험',price,price,null)), '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as GOYONG_INS , (TO_CHAR(MAX(decode(md.DEDUCTION_NAME,'장기요양보험',price,price,null)), '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as JANGGI_INS , (TO_CHAR(MAX(decode(md.DEDUCTION_NAME,'국민연금',price,price,null)), '9,999,999,999'))||'원' as GUKMIN FROM EMP e , MONTH_SALARY ms , WORK_INFO w, MONTH_DEDUCTION md , POSITION p,DEPT d WHERE e.EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND e.EMP_CODE = w.EMP_CODE AND e.dept_code=d.dept_code AND md.APPLY_YEAR_MONTH = ms.APPLY_YEAR_MONTH AND ms.APPLY_YEAR_MONTH = #{applyMonth} AND P.POSITION_CODE = e.POSITION_CODE GROUP BY e.EMP_NAME, p.POSITION, d.DEPT_name, w.HIREDATE, p.BASE_SALARY , ms.APPLY_YEAR_MONTH, ms.SALARY, ms.TOTAL_EXT_SAL, ms.TOTAL_DEDUCTION, ms.TOTAL_PAYMENT, ms.REAL_SALARY,MS.COST
